alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Blair; Huntingdon (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 4:04PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN BEDFORD... SOUTHWESTERN HUNTINGDON AND SOUTHERN BLAIR COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM EDT... At 402 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Blue Knob State Park to near Woodbury and Saxton. Movement was north northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Altoona, Huntingdon, Hollidaysburg, Roaring Spring, Mount Union, New Enterprise, Martinsburg, Lakemont, Claysburg, Williamsburg, Duncansville, Osterburg, Dudley, St. Clairsville, Raystown Dam, Ski Gap, Entriken, Royer, Queen and Shy Beaver. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.
